answers.answer: During your stay in Oradea, there are several organizations and individuals who can provide assistance. Some options include the local tourist office, international student services at the university or college you attend, as well as various community centers, churches, and non-profit groups. Additionally, many hotels offer concierge services for their guests, and some businesses may be willing to assist with specific needs. It is always best to ask around and explore different resources available to find the most suitable person or organization to address your particular situation.

answers.answer: There are various activities and programs available for you to participate in when you arrive in Oradea. These include cultural events such as concerts, theater performances, exhibitions, festivals, and more. Additionally, there are sports clubs, fitness centers, swimming pools, and other recreational facilities where you can engage in physical activity. You may also find community organizations, volunteer groups, and support services that cater to your needs and interests.

answers.answer: The services offered include free, anonymous, and confidential psycho-medical-social HIV support from specialist doctors at 10 Regional HIV Centers in Romania, as well as expertize and support from Sens Pozitiv.
